DOC.brief_summary: The study investigate efficacy various dos regimens EXC 001 reduce skin scar subject undergoing revision scar prior surgery . The study also evaluate safety tolerability EXC 001 placebo .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study EXC 001 Improve Appearance Scars From Prior Breast Surgery
DOC.criteria: Subjects must previous breast surgery result unacceptable scar . Subject choose breast scar revise . Subject must pregnant lactating . Currently pregnant pregnant 6 month , prior inclusion study lactate . Participation another clinical trial within 30 day prior start study . Any condition prior therapy , , opinion PI , would make subject unsuitable study .
